عزيزي المتصفح الرياضي العربي صاحب الشغف والثقافة العالية
 
تطبيق كووورة يسبق عصره ويتفوق على الحاضر ليحاكي المستقبل .. تطور مذهل وتقنية بأرفع وأرقى المستويات، متاح حاليا في متجر آبل
 
كن رفيقا لموقع كووورة أول وأكبر موقع رياضي في الوطن العربي والشرق الأوسط، كن حاضرا أينما أنت وفي كل الأوقات عبر هاتفك الذكي، امتلك عالم كووورة بسنوات خبرته وكامل حذافيره بين يديك.
 
دوري أبطال أوروبا والدوريات الإسباني والانجليزي والايطالي والالماني والفرنسي واكبر الدوريات في العالم وكل البطولات العربية والمحلية.
 
تابع دون توقف او انقطاع أحدث الأخبار والفيديوهات السريعة ونتائح المباريات بمختلف التفاصيل الدقيقة والارقام الاحصائية لحظة بلحظة مع خدمة فائقة الذكاء للإشعارات والتنبيهات.
 
أكبر مركز للمباريات والمعلومات والأرشيف والصور في الشرق الأوسط والعالم يتوفر في مكان واحد وبلمسة واحدة فقط.
 
اصنع محتوى تطبيق كووورة كما تحب، لأنه يمنحك حرية الانتقاء والاختيار بما يضمن ظهور الأخبار والفيديوهات للفرق واللاعبين الذين تختارهم فقط.
 
هذه دعوة مفتوحة بلا قيود أو شروط لمرافقة تطبيق كووورة.. كن ذكيا وكن مع المستقبل.

Simple Interval Timer (SIT) can be used for any kind of interval training, such as running, cycling, HIIT sessions (including Tabata method), stretching, etc.

SIT is exactly what you would expect. An interval timer, which is easy to set up and use. It features a nice plain design, with no unnecessary controls. 

Adjust Number of Sets, Action and Break duration to your needs and you are ready to go!

On the iOS an extra switch control allows you to prevent the screen from dimming.

SIT remembers the last 5 configurations you have used. Swipe left across the Settings screen to switch to another configuration.

SIT can run in the background, while you are playing music, watching videos or doing anything else on your iOS device.

SIT Watch features the same simplicity as the iOS app while offering the same functionality, plus it will measure your heartbeat during the workout sessions. The recordings will be available in the Apple's Health app.

SIT Watch runs independently of the phone, so no need to have your phone around during your workouts (although you will need your phone during the very first time you launch SIT watch).

SIT lets you avoid any tedious set up and focus on your training!

tackl – the football match prediction game to play with friends

With tackl, you can now challenge friends to take part in a betting game. The principle is very simple. You can bet on one matchday, or, find out, over an entire season, who is the best football expert among your friends. Of course, our football game prediction app is available free of charge!
 
Select leagues, predict games, challenge friends, win drinks
 
tackl is very simple: select the league, provide specific predictions for all games, and then challenge friends. The advantage here is that you can challenge friends, and win treats, like a cup of coffee, beer or shots. With tackl, you can keep track of all betting debts among your friends!
 
You can play the football prediction game every day
 
The tackl app enables you to start a match prediction every day. But it’s not just friends you can challenge. You can also participate in one of the many public tackl games. There are many competitions available. At the weekend, you can bet on all Premier League games, and on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, all Champions League games. You can also predict the Bundesliga, LaLiga, Ligue1 and Serie A. Predict all games, and we find the best opponents for you.
 
Predict one game day or an entire season
 
It’s just the thing for quickly predicting the Champions League in the evening while you’re out with friends. Perfect for when you want to challenge colleagues and start a betting league at work. With tackl, you decide whether you want to spontaneously play a game day or the entire season in a group. It takes two minutes to set up a new tackl.
 
Invite friends easily
 
With tackl, it's easy to invite friends. Send them a tackl invitation via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS or email, and they will be automatically connected with you after they have downloaded the app. It’s never been easier to set up a game with friends.
 
The football prediction game awards you 4, 3, 2 or 0 points
 
The points in tackl are distributed as follows: When your prediction is correct, you receive 4 points. When you predict the right winner and the correct goal difference, you receive 3 points. When you pick the right winner, you receive 2 points. When your prediction is completely wrong, you, of course, receive no points.
